name: test-deps-intaller
description: This package hiding test dependincies from main repo because puppeteer is pretty big.

scripts.unit: rollup -c rollup.unit.config.js && rimraf node_modules/three && qunit -r failonlyreporter -f !-webonly unit/build/three.source.unit.js
scripts.unit-examples: rollup -c rollup.unit.config.js && rimraf node_modules/three && qunit -r failonlyreporter -f !-webonly unit/build/three.example.unit.js
